name: UserVoice
description: A feedback, helpdesk and knowledge base Software as a Service
summary: UserVoice Feedback collects and prioritizes suggestions from customers as they list ideas and vote on them. UserVoice HelpDesk is a support tool for tracking and responding to customer issues.
features: Easy product management and customer support
scenario: When you want to allow your customers to select the next big feature of your product
When you want to offer an help desk for easy ticket-based support
When you want to interactively communicate with your customers
